mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (id, reg_user_id, upd_user_id, title, content, reg_dt, upd_dt) VALUES (#{id}, #{regUserId}, #{updUserId}, #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, u.name AS writer, a.title AS title, a.content AS content FROM article a JOIN user u ON a.reg_user_id = u.id ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC;
SELECT a.id AS id,u.name AS writer, a.title AS title, a.content AS content FROM article a JOIN user u ON a.reg_user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id};
SELECT a.id AS id, u.login_email AS loginEmail FROM article a JOIN user u ON a.reg_user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{article.title}, content = #{article.content}, upd_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_user_id = #{article.updUserId} WHERE id = #{id};
